listened.title: Random Access Memories
listened.description: An exceptional album - I love everything about it. A complete no skip, this album has followed me for so many years that I've ended up associating more than one song with different old crushes... My personnal favorite.

listened.title: The Dark Side of the Moon
listened.description: A very powerful and innovative album, listened to it on a plane coming back from Italy, truly a great experience.

listened.title: Good Kid, M.A.A.D City
listened.description: A powerful album that tells a story. Kendrick's flow and the production are top-notch.

to_listen.title: Don't Tap the Glass
to_listen.description: Tyler's latest album, didn't take the time to listen to it yet but I love his music so I hope it will be great.
